info.description:
Installation
------------
# pip install servermonitor


Usage examples
--------------

import servermonitor

# Maintain the config file

# Mention the server details in the excel sheet

# Mention the mount point and command for the server

# Mention the Path(s) and file(s) for the house-keeping

# Perform the housekeeping based on the disk usage

# Save the server statistic details in the output excel file

# Check the logs for operational processes


Compatibility
-------------
Python 2 Tested: Python 2.6+
servermonitor Tested: Unix


Author
------
Created by chandresh soni <chndsoni00@gmail.com> in 2017
info.name: servermonitor
info.summary: A python module to monitor the servers and preform housekeeping
